sourcesContent:
<template>
  <consumer
    v-slot="{headerHeight}"
  >
    <vueper-slides
      3d
      v-if="pageName !== ''"
      :style="`height:${height(headerHeight)}px;width:100%;color:black;`"
    >
      <!-- здесь будет потом componentsNames -->
      <vueper-slide
        :title="i.toString()"
        style="color: black !important;background-color: white;"
        v-for="i in 2"
        :key="i"
      >
        <template #content>
          <CarouselCard
              page-name="index"
              component-name="presentation"
          />
        </template>
      </vueper-slide>
    </vueper-slides>
  </consumer>
</template>

<script>
import TheHeading from "@/components/heading/TheHeading.vue";
import TheContent from "@/components/content/TheContent.vue";
import CarouselCard from "@/components/carousels/CarouselCard.vue";
import Consumer from "../context/Consumer.vue";
import {VueperSlides, VueperSlide} from "vueperslides";

export default {
  name: "IndexView",
  components: {Consumer, TheContent, TheHeading, CarouselCard, VueperSlide, VueperSlides},
  data: () => ({
    pageName: ""
  }),
  created() {
    this.pageName = this.$route.name;
  },
  methods: {
    //@ts-ignore
    height(headerHeight) {
      let h = screen.height - screen.height * 0.3 - headerHeight;
      //console.log(document.getElementsByClassName("vueperslides__inner"));
      return h;
    },
  },
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
